name: Cave of Ones Mind
description:
My personal project product... a small adventure game that I have worked on throughout this project. 

Controls:

A + D - Move

Spacebar - Jump

J - Attack Left

L - Attack Right

Left Mouse Click - Dialogue

Credit For Specific Design:

Main Character :https://sventhole.itch.io/bandit

Arrow Sign: https://www.nicepng.com/ourpic/u2w7w7r5q8i1u2y3_arrow-sign-pixel-art/
